title: COVID-19 Home
description: *Total molecular and antigens tests performed and reported electronically for testing of COVID-19 at IDPH, commercial or hospital laboratories. All numbers displayed are provisional and will change.
cleaned_text: Data is updated on weekdays, Monday-Friday, either daily or weekly. Data is not updated on weekends or holidays. COVID-19 Resources COVID-19 Hospitalization Levels This is a rapidly evolving situation and information will be updated as needed here and on the CDC website at [https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html). For general questions about COVID-19 and Illinois' response and guidance, call
